case.title: looking for a nice Guy - 22 (new york)
case.text:
I am looking for a guy like my character and who is giving importance to women. I have been a VERY good girl this year. I hope you will grant me my Christmas wish. This sounds like the kind of girl you are looking for. If so, then you know what to do, let me know it's there. Are you that guy? If are not craigslist ROBOT please re/ply me gm/ail at: luisaanna271
Thanks AnnA
